title.rendered: PV Sindhu Roars in Singapore, Occupies ‘BWF Super 500 Title’ by taking over China’s Zhi Yi Wang in final

content.rendered:
Whole country congratulated her including PM Modi

The Indian Star Shuttler PV Sindhu’s  Roars continued in Singapore Open Championship Women’s Singles Final. Sindhu played brilliantly and occupies ‘BWF Super 500 Title’ by taking over China’s contestant Zhi Yi Wang with 21-9, 11-21, 21-15 on Sunday. She received congratulations tweets from whole country including PM Modi. Modi said in his tweet on her winning.

It is a proud moment for the country and will also give inspiration to upcoming players.

        Sindhu, The two-times Olympic medal winner won the first game of 3 against China’s Zhi Yi game with  21-9. She became dominating after the first winning, but lost the second set as Zhi Yi given her tough challenge (11-21) and  took equal in second set by 1-1(21-9, 11-21).

The match went into the decider turn in 3rd round that who will win the ‘BWF Super 500 Title. In initial of the third round China’s Champion and BWF 11th ranking star Zhi performed as leading, but  Sindhu bounced back beautifully from the tough ‘Do or Lose’ situation, finally she clichs her maiden Super 500 title of the year 2022. Zhi fought well till the end but Sindhu’s sudden bounce back attacking role in the final game played a crucial role in the latter’s victory as 21-15.

Earlier, Sindhu has defeated Japan’s Saena Kawakani, the BWF 38th ranking player in the semi-final of tournament  with 21-15, 21-7. In the order she has taken over China’s Han Yu, the BWF 19th ranking shuttler with with 17-11, 21-11 and 21-19 in quarterfinal of tournament. She has won the entry round for quarter-final against Belgian star Lianne Tan with 21-15, 21-11.

It was like a rollercoaster of emotions, but managed to pulled through and win the championship! Thank you for all your support, it means so much to me.

After winning the Singapore Open Championship Sindhu Said,

She also thanked her coach Park tae Sang and trainer Srikanth Madapalli and Physio Ms Evangeline for proper guidance.

Sindhu, The Hyderabad based Indian star Shuttler starts receiving congratulation tweets from across country after winning the  Singapore Open championship-2022. Prime Minister Narendra Modi tweeted,

I congratulate PV Sindhu on winning her first ever Singapore Open Title. She has yet again demonstrated her exceptional sporting talent and achieved success. It is a proud moment for the country and will also give inspiration to upcoming players.

Match overview:

PV Sindhu        vs        Zhi Yi Wang

21,11,21                      9, 21, 15

Brief overview on PV Sindhu’s Journey in Singapore Open-2022

Read Also: Ind vs Eng: Hardik Pandya provides balance to India, and breathing space for out-of-form batters like Virat Kohli
